amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of State to withhold from the U.S. contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency an amount equal to nuclear technical cooperation provided by the IAEA in 2007 to Iran, Syria, Sudan and Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to require the Secretary of State to withhold from the U.S. contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency an amount equal to nuclear technical cooperation provided by the IAEA in 2007 to Iran, Syria, Sudan and Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ros-Lehtinen amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 224 (Roll no. 321).
